resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104988</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104988</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206493</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The United States Enters the Korean Conflict</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Vereinigten Staaten tragen die koreanische 
$überschneidung ein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Etats-Unis écrivent le conflit coréen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estados unidos incorporam o conflito korean</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unito Dichiara entra nel conflitto 
coreano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες εισάγουν την κορεατική 
σύγκρουση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los Estados Unidos incorporan el conflicto 
coreano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features President Truman's statement, on June 27, 1950, announcing his order to send U.S. air and naval forces to help defend South Korea. Also included are teaching suggestions and links to hundreds of related documents from the Truman Presidential Library.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Merkmale Präsident Trumans die Anweisung, an Juni
27, 1950, seine Ordnung verkündend, um VEREINIGTE STAATEN zu senden 
lüften und Marinekräfte, um zu helfen, Südkorea zu verteidigen. 
Auch eingeschlossen unterrichten Vorschläge und Links zu den 
Hunderten der in Verbindung stehenden Dokumente von der Truman 
Präsidentenbibliothek.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le rapport du Président Truman's de dispositifs, 
27 juin 1950, annonçant sa commande pour envoyer les ETATS-UNIS 
aèrent et les forces navales pour aider à défendre la Corée 
Du sud. En outre inclus enseignent des suggestions et des 
liens aux centaines de documents relatifs de la bibliothèque 
présidentielle de Truman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a indicação do presidente Truman das 
características, junho em 27, 1950, anunciando sua ordem para emitir 
ESTADOS UNIDOS areja e forças navais para ajudar defender Coreia sul.
Incluído também estão ensinando sugestões e ligações às 
centenas de originais relacionados da biblioteca presidencial de 
Truman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'istruzione del presidente Truman delle 
caratteristiche, il 27 giugno 1950, annunciante il suo ordine per 
trasmettere gli STATI UNITI ventila e forze navali per contribuire a 
difendere la Corea del sud. Inoltre incluso stanno insegnando i 
suggerimenti ed i collegamenti alle centinaia dei documenti relativi 
dalla libreria presidenziale di Truman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει τη δήλωση Προέδρου Truman's, στις 27
Ιουνίου ..1950, αναγγέλλοντας την κατάταξή του να στείλει τον 
ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΟ αέρα και τις ναυτικές δυνάμεις για να βοηθήσει να 
υπερασπίσει τη Νότια Κορέα. Επίσης συμπεριλαμβανόμενος 
διδάσκει τις προτάσεις και τις συνδέσεις με τις εκατοντάδες των 
σχετικών εγγράφων από την προεδρική βιβλιοθήκη Truman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la declaración de presidente Truman de las 
características, 27 de junio de 1950, anunciando su orden para 
enviar ESTADOS UNIDOS ventila y las fuerzas navales para ayudar a 
defender Corea del sur. También incluido están enseñando 
sugerencias y conexiones a los centenares de documentos relacionados 
de la biblioteca presidencial de Truman.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206493</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104988</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-united-states-enters-the-korean-conflict</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
